entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Rosthern
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:23 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -18.5°C
